title: Steve and Kathy
creator_credit: Audio Productions and Robert J McCarty
brief_description: Investigates the problems of “going steady” through a dramatisation of the relationship of Steve and Kathy. After going together for some time they decide to break it off. The film discusses how this is best done.
description: Investigates the problems of “going steady” through a dramatisation of the relationship of Steve and Kathy. After going together for some time they decide to break it off. The film discusses how this is best done.
